item.title: Publications
item.description: All our publications are published under open licenses. If you are unable to locate a copy, please contact us and we will be happy to send it to you. 2022 Benichou L, Buschbom J, Campbell M, Hermann E, Kvacek J, Mergen P, Mitchell L, Rinaldo C, Agosti D (2022) Joint statement on best practices for the citation of authorities of scientific names in taxonomy by CETAF, SPNHC and BHL. Research Ideas and Outcomes 8: e94338.
